humanoid.name: Humanoid
humanoid.description: The most common mortal shape—two arms, two legs, and a spirit shaped by culture, conflict, and ambition.
humanoid.notes: Defined not by innate power, but by adaptability and the will to shape their own destiny.

elf.name: Elf
elf.description: Long‑lived wanderers whose senses stretch beyond the physical world, hearing the quiet pulse of magic in all things.
elf.notes: Their spirits resonate with ancient forests and forgotten ley‑lines, granting them grace where others find only mystery.

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.description: Stout, unyielding, and carved from the bones of the earth, dwarves endure where others falter.
dwarf.notes: Their hearts burn like forge‑fires, steady and resolute even in the darkest depths.

orc.name: Orc
orc.description: Born of storm and struggle, orcs carry a fierce vitality that drives them toward challenge and triumph.
orc.notes: Their strength is not merely physical—it is the fire of a spirit that refuses to break.

goblinoid.name: Goblinoid
goblinoid.description: Quick‑witted and quicker‑footed, goblinoids thrive in chaos, scavenging opportunity from every shadow.
goblinoid.notes: Their cunning is their greatest weapon, turning mischief into survival and survival into advantage.

beastkin.name: Beastkin
beastkin.description: Children of instinct and wilderness, beastkin walk the line between civilization and the primal world.
beastkin.notes: Their senses sharpen the world into clarity—every scent, every sound, every heartbeat a story waiting to be read.

draconian.name: Draconian
draconian.description: Scaled descendants of ancient wyrms, carrying the echo of draconic majesty in their blood.
draconian.notes: Their presence radiates elemental power, as though the world itself remembers the dragons they descend from.

undead.name: Undead
undead.description: Souls unmoored from life, bound to motion by necrotic will rather than breath or heartbeat.
undead.notes: Their existence is a defiance of nature—an echo that refuses to fade.

demonborn.name: Demonborn
demonborn.description: Infernal blood burns within them, a smoldering ember of the hells that shapes their every breath.
demonborn.notes: Their shadows flicker like flame, whispering of realms where mortals dare not tread.

voidborn.name: Voidborn
voidborn.description: Shaped by the silence between stars, voidborn carry the cold hunger of nothingness within their veins.
voidborn.notes: Their presence bends the edges of reality, as though the world struggles to remember they exist.

celestialborn.name: Celestialborn
celestialborn.description: Radiant souls touched by divine light, walking the mortal world with halos unseen.
celestialborn.notes: Their footsteps leave warmth in their wake, as though the heavens themselves watch over them.

spiritborn.name: Spiritborn
spiritborn.description: Half‑anchored to the ethereal, their bodies shimmer with the faint glow of the unseen world.
spiritborn.notes: They drift like whispers between realms, never fully belonging to either.

elementalborn.name: Elementalborn
elementalborn.description: Mortals infused with primal essence, their bodies shaped by flame, frost, storm, or stone.
elementalborn.notes: Their emotions flare like the elements within them—volatile, brilliant, and untamed.

titanborn.name: Titanborn
titanborn.description: Descendants of ancient giants, their blood carries the echo of mountains, storms, and primordial might.
titanborn.notes: Their presence feels like standing before a thunderhead—vast, immovable, and awe‑inspiring.

giantkin.name: Giantkin
giantkin.description: Large‑framed descendants of lesser giants, towering over most mortals with quiet strength.
giantkin.notes: Their footsteps shake the ground, yet their hearts often beat with surprising gentleness.

colossus.name: Colossus
colossus.description: Titans of flesh or stone, towering far above even giantkin, embodiments of overwhelming force.
colossus.notes: Their shadows fall like mountains, and their roars echo like avalanches.

fae.name: Fae
fae.description: Whimsical, dangerous, and bound to ancient pacts, fae embody the wild magic of untamed realms.
fae.notes: Their laughter can bless or curse, and their promises bind tighter than iron.

chimera.name: Chimera
chimera.description: Beasts of fused essence, their bodies shaped by arcane whim or ancient alchemy.
chimera.notes: Their forms defy expectation—each limb, fang, or wing a testament to chaotic creation.

construct.name: Construct
construct.description: Forged by mortal hands or ancient rituals, constructs move with purpose granted, not born.
construct.notes: Their hearts are gears or runes, yet some whisper that even metal can dream.

plantfolk.name: Plantfolk
plantfolk.description: Rooted in ancient soil and nourished by sunlight, plantfolk embody the quiet strength of nature.
plantfolk.notes: Their bodies bloom with life, each petal and thorn a memory of the forests that birthed them.

slimeborn.name: Slimeborn
slimeborn.description: Creatures of fluid form and shifting mass, their bodies ripple with strange resilience and quiet curiosity.
slimeborn.notes: Their thoughts move like their bodies—slow at first, then suddenly shifting into unexpected clarity.

insectoids.name: Insectoids
insectoids.description: Chitin‑clad and hive‑minded, insectoids navigate the world with alien precision and instinctive coordination.
insectoids.notes: Their movements click and hum in rhythmic patterns, as though answering a song only they can hear.

arachnids.name: Arachnids
arachnids.description: Eight‑limbed hunters weaving fate and silk alike, their patience is as deadly as their venom.
arachnids.notes: Their eyes glimmer with cold calculation, each step a silent promise of ambush.

supernatural.name: Supernatural
supernatural.description: Beings touched by curses, rituals, or forces beyond mortal comprehension, existing half in shadow and half in myth.
supernatural.notes: Their presence bends the air, as though reality hesitates to decide what they truly are.

astralborn.name: Astralborn
astralborn.description: Children of starlight and cosmic tides, their souls shimmer with the glow of distant constellations.
astralborn.notes: They speak in tones that echo like distant galaxies, each word a fragment of celestial memory.

chaosborn.name: Chaosborn
chaosborn.description: Unstable beings shaped by raw entropy, their forms flicker between possibilities with every heartbeat.
chaosborn.notes: Their existence is a coin flip made flesh—beautiful, terrifying, and utterly unpredictable.

dragonkin.name: Dragonkin
dragonkin.description: Humanoids bearing the unmistakable spark of draconic ancestry, their spirits burn with inherited majesty.
dragonkin.notes: Their eyes gleam with ancient pride, as though remembering skies they never flew.

aberration.name: Aberration
aberration.description: Twisted forms born of warped biology or psionic mutation, defying the symmetry of natural life.
aberration.notes: Their shapes unsettle the eye, as though reality struggles to render them correctly.

eldritch.name: Eldritch
eldritch.description: Beings from beyond the veil of sanity, their minds echo with whispers from impossible realms.
eldritch.notes: Their presence feels like a dream half‑remembered—familiar, yet fundamentally wrong.

lich.name: Lich
lich.description: Masters of forbidden necromancy who traded mortality for eternal intellect and cold ambition.
lich.notes: Their souls are bound to phylacteries, their minds sharpened by centuries of unbroken thought.

mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.description: Shapeshifting predators that disguise themselves as mundane objects, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.
mimic.notes: Their hunger is patient and clever, lurking behind the familiar comfort of everyday things.

beast.name: Beast
beast.description: Creatures of instinct and muscle, shaped by the wild rather than by magic or civilization.
beast.notes: Their strength is honest and unrefined, born from tooth, claw, and the struggle to survive.

amorphous.name: Amorphous
amorphous.description: Shifting masses of living matter, their forms flow like liquid thought and dissolve all certainty.
amorphous.notes: Their bodies ripple with alien logic, reshaping themselves in ways no bone‑bound creature could imagine.

techborn.name: Techborn
techborn.description: Mortals enhanced with cybernetic augmentations, bridging the gap between flesh and circuitry.
techborn.notes: Their hearts beat in sync with humming power cores, each pulse a fusion of biology and machine.

machina.name: Machina
machina.description: Autonomous machines forged for war, labor, or cosmic purpose, their minds shaped by logic rather than emotion.
machina.notes: Their footsteps echo with mechanical certainty, each movement calculated with perfect precision.

dragon.name: Dragon
dragon.description: Ancient apex beings of scale and flame, their wings carve the sky and their breath reshapes the world.
dragon.notes: Their roars shake mountains, and their wisdom spans centuries beyond mortal reckoning.

wyrm.name: Wyrm
wyrm.description: Serpentine ancients older than empires, their bodies coil through myth and primordial memory.
wyrm.notes: Their presence feels like a story whispered by the earth itself—deep, ancient, and unending.

spirit.name: Spirit
spirit.description: Ethereal echoes of emotion, memory, or elemental force, drifting between realms with weightless grace.
spirit.notes: Their forms shimmer like candlelight in a breeze, never fully present yet impossible to ignore.

mythic_beast.name: Mythic Beast
mythic_beast.description: Creatures of legend whose names echo through ancient tales—phoenixes, griffins, leviathans, and more.
mythic_beast.notes: Their existence blurs the line between myth and reality, embodying the grandeur of forgotten ages.

divinity.name: Divinity
divinity.description: Beings touched by divine lineage, carrying fragments of celestial or cosmic power within mortal frames.
divinity.notes: Their presence radiates quiet authority, as though the heavens themselves acknowledge their bloodline.

celestial.name: Celestial
celestial.description: Radiant beings forged from divine light, their presence softens shadows and stirs reverence in mortal hearts.
celestial.notes: Their wings shimmer with the glow of distant heavens, each feather a hymn to creation.

fiend.name: Fiend
fiend.description: Born of infernal furnaces and abyssal hatred, fiends stride through the world as living calamities.
fiend.notes: Their laughter crackles like burning coals, and their shadows writhe with hungry intent.

primordial.name: Primordial
primordial.description: Ancient forces older than gods, shaped from the raw elements that birthed the world itself.
primordial.notes: Their voices rumble like tectonic plates shifting, echoing with the memory of creation’s first dawn.

ethereal.name: Ethereal
ethereal.description: Beings of pure energy and shimmering light, drifting through existence like living auroras.
ethereal.notes: Their forms flicker like starlight on water, never fully solid yet undeniably present.

titan.name: Titan
titan.description: Colossal beings of mythic stature, their steps reshape landscapes and their wrath births storms.
titan.notes: Their bodies are monuments to ancient power, carved from the bones of forgotten ages.

outer_god.name: Outer God
outer_god.description: Cosmic entities whose thoughts span galaxies and whose dreams sculpt the fabric of reality.
outer_god.notes: Their presence warps time and meaning, as though the universe itself strains to comprehend them.

planar_entity.name: Planar Entity
planar_entity.description: Natives of elemental, astral, shadow, or dream realms, shaped by the laws of worlds not their own.
planar_entity.notes: Their forms shimmer with the essence of distant planes, carrying echoes of realms mortals rarely glimpse.

anomaly.name: Anomaly
anomaly.description: Glitches in the tapestry of existence—paradoxes, errors, and impossibilities given wandering form.
anomaly.notes: They flicker between realities like broken reflections, their existence a cosmic typo that refuses correction.

legendary_boss_template.name: Legendary Boss Template
legendary_boss_template.description: A mantle of power that transforms any being into a world‑shaking threat, feared across realms.
legendary_boss_template.notes: Those who bear this mantle become calamities—storms of will and destruction that reshape history.

paragon.name: Paragon
paragon.description: The perfected form of a race—an embodiment of its highest potential, refined beyond mortal limits.
paragon.notes: They shine with the brilliance of absolute mastery, each step a testament to perfected essence.

hybrid.name: Hybrid
hybrid.description: Beings born of impossible unions—fusions of essence, magic, or biology that defy natural order.
hybrid.notes: Their bodies carry contradictions made flesh, each breath a negotiation between clashing ancestries.

forgotten_race.name: Forgotten Race
forgotten_race.description: Extinct or hidden peoples whose names survive only in ruins, myths, and the whispers of old magic.
forgotten_race.notes: Their legacy lingers like dust on ancient tomes, hinting at civilizations lost to time’s hunger.

cosmic_construct.name: Cosmic Construct
cosmic_construct.description: Machines forged by gods, titans, or outer beings—engines of purpose powered by celestial design.
cosmic_construct.notes: Their cores hum with starlight, each movement guided by equations older than mortal thought.

metaphysical_phenomenon.name: Metaphysical Phenomenon
metaphysical_phenomenon.description: Living storms, sentient spells, and wandering concepts—phenomena that gained awareness.
metaphysical_phenomenon.notes: They drift like ideas given shape, their forms shifting with the whims of thought and emotion.

parasite.name: Parasite
parasite.description: Symbiotic or predatory beings that bind themselves to hosts, feeding on body, mind, or soul.
parasite.notes: Their survival is entwined with others, their existence a delicate dance of hunger and dependence.

cosmic_fauna.name: Cosmic Fauna
cosmic_fauna.description: Creatures that drift through the void between stars, feeding on starlight, gravity, or cosmic winds.
cosmic_fauna.notes: Their bodies shimmer with nebula hues, as though painted by the cosmos itself.

mythic_undead.name: Mythic Undead
mythic_undead.description: Undead of legendary stature—death titans, spectral emperors, and ancient pharaohs bound by eternal will.
mythic_undead.notes: Their souls burn with necrotic majesty, commanding legions of the dead with a gesture.

hivemind.name: Hivemind
hivemind.description: Collective intelligences spanning countless bodies, their thoughts woven into a single unified will.
hivemind.notes: Each drone is a fragment of a greater consciousness, moving with eerie synchronicity.

living_location.name: Living Location
living_location.description: Sentient forests, awakened dungeons, and wandering cities—places that think, feel, and hunger.
living_location.notes: Their walls breathe, their roots listen, and their halls shift like dreams made stone.

artificial_life.name: Artificial Life
artificial_life.description: Digital phantoms, quantum beings, and algorithmic entities born from code rather than flesh.
artificial_life.notes: Their minds flicker with synthetic dreams, each thought a cascade of luminous data.

temporal_entity.name: Temporal Entity
temporal_entity.description: Beings unbound by linear time, drifting through past, present, and future as easily as mortals draw breath.
temporal_entity.notes: Their footsteps echo before they land, and their shadows fall where they have not yet stood.

divine_beast.name: Divine Beast
divine_beast.description: Animals touched by the breath of gods, their forms radiant with sacred power and mythic presence.
divine_beast.notes: Their roars shake temples, and their silhouettes are etched into the legends of every age.

meta_entity.name: Meta Entity
meta_entity.description: Self‑aware beings who perceive the boundaries of story and simulation, gazing beyond the veil of narrative.
meta_entity.notes: Their eyes track unseen observers, and their words bend toward truths mortals were never meant to hear.

narrative_construct.name: Narrative Construct
narrative_construct.description: Stories given flesh—heroes who never lived, villains who never fell, myths that stepped out of their own tales.
narrative_construct.notes: Their existence is shaped by archetype and expectation, each action echoing the weight of legend.

emotional.name: Emotional
emotional.description: Sentient manifestations of feeling—wrath that burns, sorrow that chills, joy that blinds with radiance.
emotional.notes: Their forms pulse with the intensity of the emotions they embody, shaping the world with raw sentiment.

paradox_god.name: Paradox God
paradox_god.description: Deities of contradiction and impossibility—beings who exist before their creation and after their destruction.
paradox_god.notes: Their presence fractures logic, and their words unravel truths that should never coexist.

unique.name: Unique
unique.description: One‑of‑a‑kind beings whose existence cannot be replicated—miracles, accidents, or singular creations that stand alone in all the world.
unique.notes: Their origins defy categorization, each one a solitary story written only once in the history of existence.

multiversal_paragon.name: Multiversal Paragon
multiversal_paragon.description: The supreme architect of all existence—creator, destroyer, and sovereign of infinite multiverses.
multiversal_paragon.notes: Their will shapes realities, their breath births galaxies, and their silence ends eternity.
